title: (x) hand drawn 3D sans from Kinetic, similar to Blockhead - Scrib {Ignacio}
content:
from kinetic.com.sg. I thought it was Blockhead at first but it isn't.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [whatfontami.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012003032/http:/typophile.com/files/whatfontami.jpg) | 21.43 KB |
author: grod

comments.content: Looks Scrib, one of the free fonts of the Monochrome Set of [Cape Arcona](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012003032/http:/www.cape-arcona.com/)
I hate it when websites resize my browser window.

reminds me of fontboutique's "NeoRetro"  
but its an above perspective, and NeoRetro is below and skinnier
